t: Amazon.com: RESTOP™ Flexible Toilet Seat ONLY Commode not Included! : Health & Household
s: I have the RESTOP commode and accidentally left the seat behind at camp. SO glad they sell replacement seats. This seat is flexible enough to bend and fit into the bucket when not in use, but firm enough that its comfortable to sit on and you don't feel the rim of the bucket.
